about_the_game:
OVERVIEW


In this hectic couch co-op, bullet hell, roguelike where you flamethrow zombies and rocket launch bandits, you and your crew must taxi passengers to safety through the dangerous radioactive wasteland to the safe haven city of Spirowood… but for a fee! Use money earned to upgrade weapons and vehicles for more explosive action, all in the world of: Tombstone Taxi.

FEATURING


4-PLAYER COUCH CO-OP
Gather your crew and head out to fight zombies, bandits, and more while you take people from Billowfort to Spirowood!
Each player gets to choose which crew member they want to while out in the wasteland.

SHARE ONE VEHICLE
Someone drives.
Someone shoots.
And someone yells from the back while NOBODY IS DOING THEIR JOB RIGHT?! CMON! HURRY UP BOB!!! SHOOT 'EM!
Take shared control of a single vehicle and navigate as a team.

KILL SWARMS OF ENEMIES
It’s a constant turf war between the bandits and monsters, so the land is always in flux, you never know what the day will bring.
Zombies. Skeletons. Bandit gangs!! Scorpion men? Walking bombs?! Radation-spewing-leech-crawler-3-legged mutation?!? Yuck. It's gonna be a tough ride. Buckle up back there!

GAIN TEMPORARY POWERUPS
Boost your Taxi's power with upgrades out in the field and by completing quests from safe zones along the journey. Sadly, the Chief hasn't found a way to retain that power between trips so you'll need to re-acquire those powerups every time.

COLLECT TIPS FOR UPGRADES
Use money earned from taxiing passengers to upgrade weapons and vehicles for more explosive action!
Plus you can visit Jerry's shop with some collected Spare Parts and he might be able to craft you something brand spanking new.

AVOID RADIATION
Annnd make sure you do all the above without causing your passengers to mutate into flesh-eating zombies MID-RIDE
While you and your crew are immune to the radiation, your passengers are not. It will increase intensity over time and lead to a slow and painful death (for them, not you).
